thread.title: 'A Christmas Story' star Peter Billingsley engaged to woman named Buffy
thread.title_full: 'A Christmas Story' star Peter Billingsley engaged to woman named Buffy | Fox News

author: TVGuide
title: 'A Christmas Story' star Peter Billingsley engaged to woman named Buffy
text:
Published October 20, 2015 TVGuide Facebook 0 Twitter 0 Email Print It wouldn't be Christmas without this quirky family flick, centered on Ralphie, the blue-eyed boy who longs for a BB gun of his very own.
Watching 'A Christmas Story' has become a holiday tradition for millions as the 1983 movie has become an instant holiday classic thanks to its memorable cast and quotable scenes.
Before you watch it this year, check out our "then-and-now" look at the Hohman, Indiana, family and friends.
Then/Now: The Cast of 'A Christmas Story' All Ralphie wanted was a Red Ryder BB gun, but everyone kept telling him, "You'll shoot your eye out!" Were they right?
Peter Billingsley , who played Ralphie in the 1983 holiday classic " A Christmas Story ," is engaged, Us Weekly reports.
Billingsley, 44, will marry his girlfriend, Buffy Bains, a graduate of Southern Methodist University who filmed a promotional video for Chicago Young Republicans in 2010. There's no word on whether the actor will wear a bunny suit to the ceremony.
Billingsley's recent movie credits include "Elf," "Iron Man" and "The Break-Up." He also works as a producer and has executive-produced such films as "Iron Man" and "Couples Retreat." In addition, he was an executive producer of "A Christmas Story: The Musical!" in 2010.
